statements: DELETE FROM researcher_data WHERE id = 1 AND age > 30
DELETE FROM investigations WHERE reason = 'Duplicate entry';
DELETE FROM outliers WHERE data_value < 0 AND id IN (SELECT outlier_id FROM investigations WHERE reason = 'Outlier Detected');
DELETE FROM Investigations WHERE researcher_id = 100 AND outlier_id = 2;
DELETE FROM Outliers WHERE dataset_id = 1 AND outlier_type = 'HIGH';
DELETE FROM Investigations WHERE investigation_id = 5 AND researcher_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Datasets WHERE dataset_name = 'Sample Dataset';
